notesStmt.note: Several of the extant folios have been more or less damaged and/or mutilated. Lacuane after folios: 170, 227, 272. Water-damaged.
Yosef Kohen ben Avraham ... ben Yosef Kohen: inscribed, folio 1r. Shemu᾿el ben Yehudah ben Shemu᾿el: inscribed, folio 1r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The third part of the commentary of Japheth ben Ali ha-Levi on the book of Isaiah.

collation.p: 29 quires of 10 leaves each, with exception of the 1st and 10th which have 3 leaves each, and the 19th which have 9 leaves. Quires signed with Hebrew letters and Arabic words on theupper margin of the first page.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Yefet. Commentary on Isaiah. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2502.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [273v].
